org.apache.beam.sdk.state

Interface StateBinder


  • @Internal
public interface StateBinder
    For internal use only; no backwards-compatibility guarantees.

    Visitor for binding a StateSpec and to the associated State.

    • Method Summary

      • bindWatermark

        WatermarkHoldState bindWatermark(java.lang.String id,
                                 StateSpec<WatermarkHoldState> spec,
                                 TimestampCombiner timestampCombiner)
        Bind to a watermark StateSpec.

        This accepts the TimestampCombiner that dictates how watermark hold timestamps added to the returned WatermarkHoldState are to be combined.
